urls.title: Cathay Pacific Fly Ready: Pre-verify your documents
urls.description: Fly Ready will help you make sure your COVID-19 test & other documents meet the travel requirements before your flight to Hong Kong.

data.text:

We’re introducing Fly Ready: a convenient way to upload your COVID-19 test results and other required health documents before your flight to Hong Kong. urls.title: Home | Fly Pink Hong Kong
urls.description: 25 Sept, 9:00 am HKT – 05 Nov, 9:00 am HKT This year we have some exciting new products for the Fly Pink Hong Kong collection. Visit our Charity Sales shop before it runs out! Fly Pink is an initiative founded by QantasLink pilots in 2015. A small group of female pilots of Cathay Pacific Airways then continued the initiative from 2016 onwards. Currently it is run by a core volunteer team of 4 flight crew members. The Hong Kong Breast Cancer Foundation (HKBCF) was set up on 8 March 2005, as a non-profit

urls.title: Our Economy fares
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. More choices. More flexibility. More value. We’ve designed our Economy fares to give you total choice and flexibility when booking flights. Our Light, Essential and Flex fares are tailored, so you never pay fo r what you don’t need. Each fare offers you increasingly more control and greater benefits, from enhanced baggage allowances to flexible rebooking and upgrade options. Jetting off for a weekend getaway or happy

data.text:
The redesigned Economy fares will be introduced progressively across our network in phases.

Learn more: https://t.co/Z3srE0y2e9

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond

No two travellers are the same—let alone three! That’s why we’ve introduced our new Economy fares to suit everyone. Whether you like travelling light, heading off on a long holiday, or need flexibility for your next business trip, you can now enjoy more choices and  benefits. https://t.co/FTTIt9EA8U

urls.description: 60 companies are accelerating the supply and use of sustainable aviation fuel to reach 10% of global jet aviation fuel supply by 2030

data.text:
Working together, we are determined to put the global aviation sector on the path to net-zero emissions by 2050.

Learn more about the initiative: https://t.co/aX3Xo46A2D…

#CleanSkies4Tomorrow #CathayPacific #MoveBeyond
